title: What language should I use to connect to WP- Woocommerce API?
body:
I'm trying to make a product customizer for my e-commerce based in woocommerce. I need to list some products, get their price, filter(with ajax)... calculate the price and finally add it to the cart.

I have tried to connect with PHP, and axios, but with axios I'm not able to connect (could be my knowledge lack about the API's world )

https://woocommerce.github.io/woocommerce-rest-api-docs/

I have been using the default library which woocommerce gives, but I cant get some results:

require __DIR__ . '/vendor/autoload.php';

use Automattic\WooCommerce\Client;

So, I have seen some github libraries which seems to be better... like:

https://github.com/kloon/WooCommerce-REST-API-Client-Library

I normally use PHP but if it's better do it with JS or nodeJS, i'll try.

I need some help, Thanks
